pr_title: NXP-28869: Add a new API to refresh AWS tokens in the batch handler

timeline.message:
NXP-28869: Add a new API to refresh AWS tokens in the batch handler

The new API can be used from `/upload/{batchId}/refresh`.
It will return new tokens when the batch handler can
handle the request, else it will throw an error.

timeline.author: BoboTiG

timeline.bodyText: Better to use awaitility instead, see https://github.com/nuxeo/nuxeo/blob/master/modules/platform/nuxeo-platform-tag-service/nuxeo-platform-tag-core/src/test/java/org/nuxeo/ecm/platform/tag/AbstractTestTagService.java#L120 for instance.
timeline.author: ataillefer

replies.bodyText: I finally removed that logic, it would introduce random failures. The new check is less error prone.
replies.author: BoboTiG

timeline.author: efge

replies.bodyText: [For the history of that specific ticket] It has been decided to use default only for backports.
replies.author: BoboTiG

timeline.bodyText: I'd call it /refreshToken to be more explicit. "refresh" in the context of a batch upload does not immediately evoke the auth token.
